title: Customs entry documents and clearance certificates
dataVerified: Importer, customs broker, entry number, duty/tax paid, goods classification
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Entry status (cleared/examined/audited). Link to customs broker/authority system (importer and customs, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered customs entries (duty evasion). Domain binding verifies customs broker/authority. Audit trail for customs compliance. Prevents post-clearance entry manipulation.
